extendedInfo.description: Pinckney State Recreation Area guide by Exploration Guides.This app is everything you need to visit Pinckney State Recreation Area, located just northwest of Ann Arbor, Michigan.  Whether you're hiking, canoeing, mountain biking, cross-country skiing, bird watching, or exploring, Exploration Guides' Pinckney State Recreation Area gives you everything you need to make the most of your visit.Includes:* Full, surveyed trail maps - over 86 km!* Suggested trails* Favorite trail: pick a trail and it highlights on the map* GPS navigation - includes the ultimate "You are here!" * Electronic compass* Camera integration: take pictures and send to email, FaceBook, and more* Major points of interest, including Exploration Guides' custom web pages with all the information you'll need* View maps with either the standard Google Maps view, or areal photography/satellite view* Park your car, touch the screen, and your car appears on the map.  Never lose your car again! (yes, you can use this outside the park, too!)* Check current weather, or the 10-day forecast for the park* Get turn-by-turn directions to the park with Google NavigationWe're all explorers.  You just need the right guide!

reviews.title: First look
reviews.comment: Has potential. Trails don\'t seem to scale when map is rescaled.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: 1.0.3 update
reviews.comment: The 1.0.3 update allows you to move to SD.
reviews.author: A Google User
